features.title: Glassmorphism Layout Structure
features.description: Implement the main application layout with a centered glassmorphism card container, gradient background, and responsive padding.

steps: Verify background has a dynamic gradient
Verify the main container has a blur effect (backdrop-filter)
user_story.expected_outcome: The app appears centered with a premium glass-like container over a vibrant background.

vibe_check.aesthetic_notes: Background: Gradient from Indigo-500 to Purple-600. Card: bg-white/10 backdrop-blur-lg border-white/20.

features.title: Todo Input with Glow Effect
features.description: A text input field for creating new tasks. Must glow when focused and support 'Enter' key submission.

user_story.expected_outcome: The input glows on focus. Upon 'Enter', the input clears and the task appears in the list.

vibe_check.aesthetic_notes: Focus ring should be a soft purple glow (ring-purple-500/50). Clear transition on submit.

features.title: Animated Todo List Rendering
features.description: Render the list of todo items. Each item must animate in (slide-down + fade-in) when added.

user_story.expected_outcome: New item slides down gracefully. AnimatePresence should be used for exit animations.

vibe_check.aesthetic_notes: Use Framer Motion AnimatePresence. Duration: 0.3s, Ease: easeOut.

features.title: Status Filter Tabs
features.description: Tabs to filter todos by All, Active, Completed. The active tab should have a sliding pill background.

steps: Verify only completed items are shown
user_story.expected_outcome: List updates instantly. The active pill background slides to the clicked tab.

vibe_check.aesthetic_notes: LayoutId animation for the active tab background (Framer Motion).

features.title: Edit Task Modal
features.description: Clicking an item opens a modal to edit text. The modal should pop in with a spring animation.

user_story.expected_outcome: Modal appears with backdrop. Saving updates the list item immediately.

vibe_check.aesthetic_notes: Modal: Scale up (0.9 -> 1.0) and Fade In. Backdrop: Blur-sm.

features.title: Recurring Task Logic
features.description: Allow tasks to be set as recurring (Daily, Weekly). Completing them should spawn the next instance.

user_story.expected_outcome: Current task marked done. A new task 'Meeting' created with tomorrow's date.

vibe_check.aesthetic_notes: Recurrence icon should pulse briefly when the next task is spawned.

features.title: Smart Paste Import
features.description: Allow users to paste a list of text features and auto-convert them into multiple todo items.

features.title: Global Gradient Polish
features.description: Refine the global background mesh gradient to be more subtle and breathing.
